item.title: In Trying To Generate Playoff Drama, NASCAR ‘Rigged’ Its Championship
item.description: NASCAR has dramatically altered its product in the hopes of retaining fan interest, but it has to live with the consequences of the changes it has wro...

item.title: Trump Should Immediately Stop Federal Agencies From Hiding Documents By Needlessly Marking Them Classified
item.description: Files should be open to the public unless otherwise specified, not secret by default. We the people have a right to know what our government does in o...

item.title: Voters Rejected Not Just Kamala Harris But Democrats’ Politics Of Division
item.description: A radical political and cultural realignment rejected superficial divisions, embraced American tradition, and made Trump our 47th president.

item.title: Trump And Vance Should Immediately Push A Populist, Family-Friendly Agenda
item.description: Trump and Vance need to make dramatic populist moves now while GOP voters' appetite for economic libertarianism has dwindled.

item.title: Wisconsin GOP Senate Candidate ‘Shocked By What Unfolded’ On Election Night, Mulls Recount
item.description: Eric Hovde, who challenged Dem Sen. Tammy Baldwin in a tight race, is raising election integrity alarms after Milwaukee Election Day mess.
